name: Prediction Game
description:
[How to play]

It's a game to predict what it will say by looking at pictures and names.


[Game Features]

⊙ If you predict longer word, you can get high score and experience.

⊙ You can create your own quizzes. After drawing with a picture or animation, write the lines to create a fun text.

⊙ You can share your quizzes with others by sending the code.
